content:
Archimedes had a bath and then drained the water in his tub. The dashed line in the widget below describes the amount of water left in the tub (in liters) as a function of time (in minutes).

A day later Archimedes had another bath, this time with $40$ liters of water more. When he drained the tub, the draining occurred at the same rate as before.

**Drag the points to define the amount of water left in the tub as a function of time for the second day.**
